hero.title: Building
hero.description: 10+ years of experience in fintech, travel tech, and food e-commerce. Specializing in React, Next.js, and TypeScript with a focus on performance optimization and delivering measurable business results.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.description: A comprehensive toolkit built over 10+ years of frontend development

testimonials.title: What Colleagues Say
testimonials.description: Described as proactive, a fast learner, and effective collaborator

1.name: Team Lead
1.content: Renan consistently delivers high-quality frontend solutions. His expertise in React and performance optimization has been instrumental in achieving our Lighthouse score goals across multiple client projects.

2.name: Product Manager
2.content: Working with Renan was a game-changer for our e-commerce platform. His 60% page load improvement directly contributed to our 30% increase in conversion rates.

3.name: Senior Developer
3.content: Renan's ability to migrate legacy systems to modern React architecture while maintaining business continuity is remarkable. A true professional who understands both technical and business needs.

cta.description: Whether you're looking for a frontend engineer to join your team, need consulting on a project, or want to collaborate on something exciting, I'd love to hear from you.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Senior Frontend Engineer with 10+ years of experience building scalable web applications
about.intro: I'm a Senior Frontend Engineer based in Brazil, working remotely with teams worldwide. My focus is on building high-performance, user-centric web applications using modern technologies.
